casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Frank Durand TOMLIN 532P08-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 11, 2018 Ms. Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC Ms. Amanda S. Zimmer, Southern Pines, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Tomlin, Frank Durand Mr. Frank Durand Tomlin, for Tomlin, Frank Durand Mr. J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of July 2018 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of July 2018."
